About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself...

Hi, My name is Binyamin Abebe, Looking for a job as a web developer, I have skills in those languages and technologies: JavaScript, ES6, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, OOP, Socket.io, Express, Sass, jQuery, ReactJS, Redux, Angular, Node.JS, MongoDB, Docker, SQL, MySQL and TypeScript. I have learned all those languages and technologies with hard work and passion. I strongly believe that someone like me will be a valuable addition to any team.




My favorite quote is: "I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying." (Michael jordan)

What I bring with me

consistency

Doing my best in every technology I have learned, don't let distractions bother me.

social

I am a very sociable person who likes to help, get to know people and learn from others.

SELF DISCIPLINED

I developed my discipline, built myself a learning program that brought out the best in me.
